channel.title: Blogging on Rukshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Rukshan's Blog

item.title: Medium and Google is not a good combination
item.description: I know this is going to sound just like another complaint against Google, but I want my Google results to be better.

item.title: Please donâ€™t spam my blog. SEO myths you need to stop believing
item.description:
I have several WordPress blogs, related to different topics. Including my personal blog.

Each day I have to moderate several comments on all of my blogs, which are made my people trying to boost their SEO to their websites, most of them are selling fake medications, or fake online offers, or people trying to build back links to rank higher on Google results.

item.title: Starting a blog has never been this difficult
item.description: I feel blogging is making a comeback, why? Because people are starting to realize that they can carve their own brand and be content creators, rather than just sharing your thoughts among few Facebook friends.
